lines.text: Oh, I've always wanted to go swimming in the moonlight.
What'll we do for bathing suits.

[pouring a drink]
This is gonna be a slippery drink for sliding girls.
The way your customers are hooked on the stronger stuff, like cocaine and heroin, you'll soon be ice queen of the snow peddlers.

[holds up girl's panties]
I'm gonna fill these up!
Take it from me, Tony. I'm gonna get enough money to make that sister of mine look like a piker!
You're stopping me at my favorite sin.
There's no honeymooning until after we're married!
But Blondie, you know what the rap is for a snatch job.
That's the beauty of it. There won't be any rap. Would a well-heeled society dame tell the whole world it's her own sister who stole her kid?
One hot lover coming right up!
One ripe peach coming right down!
Narcotics Bring Ruin / The drug habit is expensive and the usefulness of the victim is gone.
Wave of Brutal Crimes Laid to Marihuana Smoking
